                         ExistingCompetitionException,

        Settle bets on podium
        Parameters:
        competition - Competition's name
        winner - Winner
        second - First runner-up
        third - Second runner-up
        managerPwd - Manager's password
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - The manager's password is invalid
        ExistingCompetitionException - The competition is not existed
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL problem
